text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump Oh you mean the same Trump that waited 70 days to act on this Coronavirus.  You can shove it, the toddler and chief needs major oversight.  There should not be a fucking bidding war on PPE.  Hope your family doesn't contract lol.
